allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: scaffold expo project with tab navigation

- Initialize Expo project with TypeScript template
- Install expo-router, AsyncStorage, expo-keep-awake and other dependencies
- Configure app.json with scheme, typed routes, and Android share intent
- Create app directory with root and tab layouts
- Add placeholder tab screens \(home, library, profile\)
- Set up Jest with ts-jest for testing
- Configure path aliases \(@/\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add theme with design tokens

- Add COLORS with all design system colors including surface alias
- Add FONTS with Courier mono configuration
- Add spacing function \(4px base unit\)
- Add fontSize and letterSpacing helpers
- Include rarity and prestige color tokens

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add core data types

- Add Book type with status, reading time, companion
- Add ReadingSession type for timer tracking
- Add Companion type for generated pixel companions
- Add UserProgress type for XP, streaks, loot
- Add LootItem type with rarity tiers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add AsyncStorage layer for books, sessions, progress

- Add storage module with getBooks, saveBook, deleteBook
- Add getSessions, saveSession for reading tracking
- Add getProgress, saveProgress for XP and streaks
- Include default progress initialization

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
